actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to require the Secretary of Education to develop comprehensive tests of academic excellence, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act to direct the Secretary of Education to develop or approve comprehensive tests of academic excellence for identifying outstanding students in the eleventh grade of public and private secondary schools. Directs the Secretary to: (1) establish a program for conducting such tests; (2) prepare a certificate to be awarded to students who score at a sufficiently high level; and (3) report to the Congress on estimated costs of test administration, scoring, and analysis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to require the Secretary of Education to develop comprehensive tests of academic excellence, and for other purposes.
